verbose_text: A crucial aspect of this model, which is displayed schematically in XREF_FIG A, is that both phosphatases dephosphorylate the same substrates (KNL1-pMELT, KNL1-pRVSF, BUBR1-pLSPI, and pNDC80) with identical kinetics when docked to their native SLiMs on KNL1.
evidence: dephosphorylate the same substrates (KNL1-pMELT, KNL1-pRVSF, BUBR1-pLSPI
